title: Email fails to be processed due to unknown user or address
content:
The user receives the following email notification:

We could not process your email. You may not be a registered Service Management Automation user. Contact your system administrator.
To verify that you are a registered user, try to log in to the Service Portal. If you are a user, make sure to use the same email address that's listed for you in the system when you send emails.

Note: To send this notification to users, the Enable error notifications to unknown senders option must not be turned off (default: ON) on the Administration > Configuration > Service Portal Settings > FEATURE SETTINGS page.

Cause

A user with the sender's email address was not found in Service Management.

Solution

Make sure the user's email address is correctly specified in the People module in Service Management (Administration > Master Data > People).

Note: once an email address is identified as an unknown sender, the system will not process emails from this address until after 30 minutes.

Contact Support if the problem persists for multiple users.
